div.t-att-class: 'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'under_review' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'awaiting_payment' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'manufacturing' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'delivery' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'completed' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'under_review' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'awaiting_payment' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'manufacturing' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'delivery' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if process_state == 'completed' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'

t.h4: There are currently no orders to pay !
You haven't submitted an order ! submit now

t.h3: Your Address or Sign Up Log In

t.t-value: country and [x for x in country.get_address_fields() if x in ["zip", "city"]] or ["city", "zip"]

div.t-att-style: (not country or not country.state_ids) and 'display: none'
div.label: *State / Province

option.t-att-selected: s.id == ('state_id' in checkout and country and checkout['state_id'] != '' and int(checkout['state_id']))

a.class: btn btn-default btn-primary pull-right mb32 a-submit a-submit-disable a-submit-loading

div.class: row bg-white has-shadow item-flex pt-20 pl-20

div.t-att-class: 'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if state=='payment' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'
'item d-flex align-items-center ni-active' if state == 'refund' else 'item d-flex align-items-center'

You haven't submitted an order ! submit now

div.t-att-class: 'od-li-content od-li-content2 od-li-content-active' if ask.state in ['replied', 'read', 'complete'] else 'od-li-content od-li-content2'
